layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutView at (0,0) size 800x600
layer at (0,0) size 800x600
  LayoutBlockFlow {HTML} at (0,0) size 800x600
    LayoutBlockFlow {BODY} at (8,20) size 784x480
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (20,0) size 744x55
        LayoutInline {SPAN} at (0,0) size 291x53
          LayoutText {#text} at (0,1) size 291x53
            text run at (0,1) width 291: "      multiple    "
        LayoutText {#text} at (290,1) size 307x53
          text run at (290,1) width 307: "     shadows      "
      LayoutBlockFlow {DIV} at (100,155) size 100x100
